commit message: build: update target API to 23 (Android 6.0 support)
lines inters: fix crash on perp. checkbox click in land. mode (fix #724)
tests: add utility function to change locale

tests: set locale to en_US for calculations tests

This way we ensure the calculation tests do pass regardless of the
locale set on the device. This is because the result tests values are
hardcoded and use a '.' as the decimal separator and some other locales
use something else (such as fr_FR using ',').

misc: fix parsing to double with some locale (fix #630, #638, #722)

The fix seems rather a hack but one has to consider that even if the
locale uses a ',' as the decimal separator, most Android keyboards do
not allow using something else than a '.' when the field is set to
numeric...
test: add a test for the line circle intersection calculation
fix line-circle calculation with perpendicular check (fix #622)
